titles.title: FARMLAND Act of 2025
FARMLAND Act of 2025
Foreign Agricultural Restrictions to Maintain Local Agriculture and National Defense Act of 2025
To amend the Agricultural Foreign Investment Disclosure Act of 1978 to strengthen oversight over foreign investment in the United States agricultural industry, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Foreign Affairs, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture.
